'''Soloist's Solicitation''' is [[Furina]]'s [[Normal Attack]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Unlike all other [[Sword]] users, Furina's Charged Attack is not preceded by a Normal Attack.
* The cooldowns for Spiritbreath Thorn and Surging Blade are separate.
* Furina has special visual and audio effects when performing a [[Plunging Attack]] into or onto water without transitioning into [[swimming]], such as when [[Salon Solitaire|her Elemental Skill]] is active or when plunging into shallow water.
** The visual effect appears even if her Elemental Skill is not active.
** The audio effect only plays when performing a High Plunge.

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
* {{Talent Note|constellation|6|"Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"}}

==Trivia==
* Using the Charged Attacks will also change Furina's appearance alongside her current Arkhe status.
* Furina's Normal and Charged Attacks have a unique bubble-like on-hit effect.
** When under the effects of [["Hear Me — Let Us Raise the Chalice of Love!"|Furina's 6th Constellation]], said on hit effect is blue instead of the normal white.
*According to Furina's Collected Miscellany, the spherical aura that surrounds Furina when she uses her Charged Attack is called her "pas seul aura."
